description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, in wma_unified_link_radio_stats_event_handler(), the number of radio channels coming from firmware is not properly validated, potentially leading to an integer overflow vulnerability followed by a buffer overflow.

product.name: Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel
